channel.title: Pension – Wellspring Financial
channel.description: Guiding you to a brighter financial future.

item.title: Could you live on the State Pension?
item.dc:creator: Rachael Khan
item.description: Let’s be honest, on the morning of 21 October few of us were waiting with bated breath as the latest UK inflation stats were revealed. But, for millions of people, that moment was significant. That’s because the September (Consumer Price Index) CPI inflation figure forms part of the government’s ‘triple lock’ formula used to determine […]
